physical_appearance:This pachisi game set includes a cloth board
 sixteen ivory bird-shaped gaming pieces
 and three long die. The bird game pieces are stained and grouped into four colours - red
 light green
 black and yellow. Some design elements
 such as the wings
 are carved into each piece The board is made of green silk
 lined with red cotton
 and embroided with yellow thread.

sgcool_label_text:Pachisi is a one of the oldest games originating from the Indian subcontinent. It is often referred to as the national game of India and was played by all groups of society. A pachisi set comprises of a board
 several gaming pieces and dice. Pachisi boards are fashioned in a wide variety of types and are often decorated with embroidery or beads. The gaming pieces were also made in various sizes and materials such as ivory
 bone
 glass
 silver
 although they were most commonly made of painted wood. \r\nPieces that were made in the form of female musicians or birds are considered exotic.

metadata.physical_appearance: This pachisi game set includes a cloth board, sixteen ivory bird-shaped gaming pieces, and three long die. The bird game pieces are stained and grouped into four colours - red, light green, black and yellow. Some design elements, such as the wings, are carved into each piece The board is made of green silk, lined with red cotton, and embroided with yellow thread.
metadata.sgcool_label_text:
Pachisi is a one of the oldest games originating from the Indian subcontinent. It is often referred to as the national game of India and was played by all groups of society. A pachisi set comprises of a board, several gaming pieces and dice. Pachisi boards are fashioned in a wide variety of types and are often decorated with embroidery or beads. The gaming pieces were also made in various sizes and materials such as ivory, bone, glass, silver, although they were most commonly made of painted wood. 
Pieces that were made in the form of female musicians or birds are considered exotic.
